__e: Gestapo comes into camp, love goes out the window.... or in this case, the door.
Gestapo been around? Maybe they found it.
I would do it myself, Colonel, but I'm afraid the Gestapo is following me.
The Gestapo is busy. They'll gladly get rid of me.
Gestapo is so busy these days, I'm sure they'll be glad to get rid of me.
The Gestapo has its orders, and anyone who interferes with us can find the results very chilling.
Go back playing Gestapo in your closet and let us do our job. It?
This girl... who sent our men the wrong way... she must have brought vegetables at your place many times before.
Maybe we'll chip in with the Gestapo and buy you a case of wine.
